医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
联合国机构警告饱受战争蹂躏的苏丹儿童和母亲面临严重的营养不良危机三个联合国机构今天发出严厉警告，所有迹象都表明饱受战争蹂躏的苏丹儿童和母亲的营养状况严重恶化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/UN-agcies-warn-of-ritic-malnutrition-crisis-for-children-and-mothers-in-war-torn-Sudan.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/UN-agcies-warn-of-ritic-malnutrition-crisis-for-children-and-mothers-in-war-torn-Sudan.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ffb968dd-e30c-4d36-8303-67bfbba901ff Thu, 30 May 2024 15:24:29 -0400 UN agencies warn of critical malnutrition crisis for children and mothers in war-torn Sudan
现有药物可缓解罕见遗传综合症的症状一种被批准用于治疗某些自身免疫性疾病和癌症的药物成功缓解了一种称为 1 型自身免疫性多内分泌综合征 (APS-1) 的罕见遗传综合征的症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Existing-drug-alleviates-symptoms-of-a-rare-genic-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Existing-drug-alleviates-symptoms-of-a-rare-genic-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8935d973-b4ec-45a3-865f-6acc46dde5e3 Thu, 30 May 2024 15:15:56 -0400 Existing drug alleviates symptoms of a rare genetic syndrome
女性和男性心力衰竭可能需要不同的治疗加州大学戴维斯分校医学院的一项新研究发现，射血分数保留（HFpEF）心力衰竭的雄性和雌性小鼠在细胞水平上存在显着差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Female-and-male-heart-failure-may-require-distinct-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Female-and-male-heart-failure-may-require-distinct-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e515795-e209-4baf-b63f-de69a364fae3 Thu, 30 May 2024 15:11:22 -0400 Female and male heart failure may require distinct treatments
研究：更好的睡眠健康与较低的孤独感相关即将在 SLEEP 2024 年会上公布的一项新研究发现，更好的睡眠健康与较低的孤独感相关，而且这种关联在年轻人中更为明显。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Study-Better-sleep-health-linked-with-lower-levels-of-loneiness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Study-Better-sleep-health- Associated-with-lower-levels-of-loneiness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a695ef03-bb07-4189-9dbd-6c5f0e425e59 Thu, 30 May 2024 15:01:58 -0400 Study: Better sleep health associated with lower levels of loneliness
研究发现青少年睡眠时间、社交媒体使用和大脑激活之间存在明显联系即将在 SLEEP 2024 年会上发表的一项新研究发现，睡眠持续时间、社交媒体使用和跨大脑区域的大脑激活之间存在明显的关系，而这些区域对于执行控制和奖励处理至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Study-finds-distinct-link- Between-sleep-duration-social-media-usage-and-brain-activation-in-teens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Study-finds-distinct-link- Between-sleep-duration-social-media-usage-and-brain-activation-in-teens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ddc6262-5003-4792-8a80-0cd7c2738c17 Thu, 30 May 2024 14:58:54 -0400 Study finds distinct link between sleep duration, social media usage, and brain activation in teens
患者和伴侣报告的记忆力下降可能预示着早期阿尔茨海默病的变化一项新的研究进一步证明，当患者或家人注意到持续性记忆丧失的迹象时，与医生交谈很重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Memory-decline-reported-by-病人-and-partners-may-signal-early-Alzheimers-changes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Memory-decline-reported-by-病人-and-partners-may-signal-early-Alzheimers-changes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8a00ca9-2f51-4f76-ad63-a0717fa923d9 Thu, 30 May 2024 13:19:14 -0400 Memory decline reported by patients and partners may signal early Alzheimer's changes
他汀类药物可能会阻断与癌症发展相关的炎症途径麻省总医院癌症中心（麻省总医院布里格姆医疗保健系统的创始成员之一）的研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，他汀类药物（常用的降胆固醇药物）可能会阻断与癌症发展相关的特定途径。慢性炎症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Statins-may-block-an-inflammation-pathway-involved-in-the-development-of-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Statins-may-block-an-inflammation-pathway-involved-in-the-development-of-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b28f8430-424e-41da-9551-d17f30171911 Thu, 30 May 2024 08:36:00 -0400 Statins may block an inflammation pathway involved in the development of cancer
RCSI 和 Head Diagnostics 合作彻底改变多发性硬化症评估RCSI 与 Head Diagnostics（爱尔兰都柏林）合作开展一项临床研究，通过创新技术加强对多发性硬化症 (MS) 的评估和监测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/RCSI-and-Head-Diagnostics-collaborate-to-revolutionize-multiple-sclerosis-assessment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/RCSI-and-Head-Diagnostics-collaborate-to-revolutionize-multiple-sclerosis-assessment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b857549-0b12-4daa-bd58-d5c6a504f04f Thu, 30 May 2024 08:23:46 -0400 RCSI and Head Diagnostics collaborate to revolutionize multiple sclerosis assessment
医疗补助“放松”期间，安全网健康诊所削减服务和员工蒙大拿州最大的为贫困人口提供服务的诊所之一已经削减了服务并解雇了工人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Safety-net-health-clinics-cut-services-and-staff-amid-Medicaid-e28098unwindinge28099.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Safety-net-health-clinics-cut-services-and-staff-amid-Medicaid-e28098unwindinge28099.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f96f1fb-8988-4328-b6f6-8a74e21c9330 Thu, 30 May 2024 07:06:00 -0400 Safety-net health clinics cut services and staff amid Medicaid ‘unwinding’
一项不起眼的药品折扣计划抑制了乡村医院对联邦生命线的使用面对对乡村医院关闭的持续担忧，国会山立法者提出了一系列提案，以修复一项联邦计划，该计划旨在维持全国小城镇的救生服务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/An-obscure-drug-discount-program-stifles-use-of-federal-lifeline-by-rural-hospitals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/An-obscure-drug-discount-program-stifles-use-of-federal-lifeline-by-rural-hospitals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=59abed51-99fe-451f-b15b-db917c57bc80 Thu, 30 May 2024 07:04:13 -0400 An obscure drug discount program stifles use of federal lifeline by rural hospitals
